headline: Admirer of Hitler Pleads Guilty in Death Threats Against Hispanic People
abstract: Eric Lin, who claimed that President Trump would start a “racial war,” sent a barrage of gruesome Facebook messages to a Florida woman.
lead_paragraph: A Maryland man who idolized Hitler and claimed that President Trump would start a “racial war” pleaded guilty on Tuesday to threatening to kill Hispanic people, including a South Florida woman he barraged with hateful Facebook messages.
